author: hvanhaev
body:
This is a back port of changes already included in the master, as discussed in PR: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/22424 

This contains a fix in the CASTOR noise simulation, and updates in the rechitcorrector module.
It would be good to have these too in CMSSW_80X for analyses with 2016 data.
title: backport of CASTOR updates on rechitcorrector and noise simulation
